title: Crime Alert 101722
itunes:title: Crime Alert 101722
description:
A would-be bank robber uses his hand as a poor imitation of a gun. Woman points out house where has been held captive for more than month.  Security at a restaurant is beefed up after a liquor robbery, but nobody considered the roof. 

For more crime and justice news, go to https://www.crimeonline.com/
